name: I'll be Home for Christmas (Daviado, Nats! >:3, hannahkyki, bednarzka)
name_original: I'll be Home for Christmas (Daviado, Nats! >:3, hannahkyki, bednarzka)
description:
Due to internet issues, only the video is available at this time

On one snowy day in December, this bear has found themselves lost in the woods! What began as an innocent trip to find a Christmas tree for the bear family has become a trek to get home, with only 12 days left until Christmas day. While meeting lovable characters and solving quick puzzles sprawling across 3 unique maps, help this bear navigate through the forest and find a gift before it's too late!

*********

Based off of the song "I'll be home for Christmas," and specifically the verse "Christmas eve will find you/Where the love light gleams/I'll be home for Christmas/If only in my dreams." Inspiration was taken from the song in the game music, as well as the implementation of a "dream state" to keep track of the progress towards home. A retro style is also included through the use of pixlart.

*********

Controls:

W, A, S, D => Movement

Shift + Movement => Faster Movement

E => Interact

Space => Use / Break

Q => Bonk Tree

1, 2, 3 => Use Inventory Slot
